item.title: How Trump justifies his tariffs -- from budget balancing to protecting 'the soul' of America
item.description: To President Donald Trump, "tariff" is more than "the most beautiful word in the dictionary," something he says often.

item.title: Appeals court allows Trump to fire watchdog who delayed other terminations

item.title: Trump moves House GOP holdouts closer to supporting government funding extension
item.description: House Republican holdouts appear closer to supporting a plan to avert a partial government shutdown after a meeting with President Trump.
